title: Power progress, 1951
brief_description: A report on progress being made in the building of dams and power stations as part of an extensive project to increase hydro-electric output in New Zealand. The latter part of the film shows experiments on the utilization of geo-thermal energy from the country’s many geysers.
description: A report on progress being made in the building of dams and power stations as part of an extensive project to increase hydro-electric output in New Zealand. The latter part of the film shows experiments on the utilization of geo-thermal energy from the country’s many geysers.

The latter part of the film shows experiments on the utilization of geo-thermal energy from the country’s many geysers.
